QuestData.Title: Insight into Our Enemies
QuestData.Description:
There's no telling what awaits us within this land. We cannot press forward without first knowing exactly what we're up against.
Our new allies have long been embattled with the naga. They would know best how to navigate these waters.
Speak with Blademaster Okani and see if they can provide some insight into how our enemies operate.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Blademaster Okani to learn more about the naga within Nazjatar.
